personalInfo.name: Alejandro Chang
personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer & AI Architect
personalInfo.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer with 15+ years of experience, specializing in AI-driven solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.headline: Senior Software Engineer & AI Architect with 15+ years of experience building scalable applications and innovative AI solutions.
about.description:
Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer and AI Architect with over 15 years of experience building end-to-end solutions using Java, Spring, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and React. Skilled in designing cloud-native systems, distributed architectures, and optimizing performance following DevOps best practices. Founder of Playdly, developing ATLAS, an advanced AI system for enhancing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).

Experienced at driving cross-functional collaboration, mentoring engineers and aligning technical initiatives with business goals. Committed to delivering impactful solutions at scale and fostering innovation through hands-on leadership.

Located in Burlington, Ontario, I am passionate about building software that makes a meaningful difference in people's lives.
highlights: Full-stack development with React, TypeScript, Python, and Java
Expertise in AI-driven solutions, RAG, and LLM orchestration
Cloud architecture and deployment on AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, SQS/SNS)
Strong background in data structures, algorithms, and system design
Advocate for clean code, DevOps, and software craftsmanship

experience.title: Founder & Lead Software Architect
achievements: Founded Playdly, a technology company dedicated to developing innovative AI-driven solutions that enhance productivity, trust, and efficiency in project management and automation.
Leading development on ATLAS, an advanced AI system that enhances Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) through dynamic embedding model selection and intelligent orchestration.

Designed an AI system with dynamic LLM model selection, implementing a framework that adaptively chooses among various retrieval-augmented strategies based on the context and requirements of each task.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Led development of a key service enhancement that cut onboarding time for new document types from one month to three days, enabling TurboTax to deliver real-time feedback on customer edits.
Led the team's DevOps responsibilities, ensuring 99.9% uptime for CI/CD and streamlining Git branching strategies to boost deployment speed and system stability.
Coordinated team responsibilities in company-wide effort to allow data imports for major crypto providers, securing +350K customers and increasing revenue by ~7%.
Mentored junior engineers and interns, providing leadership in troubleshooting, technical development, and best practices.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Developer
achievements: Played a key role in modernizing RBC's cross-asset single-dealer platform, boosting performance by 30% and elevating code coverage from 25% to 85%.
Engineered and deployed responsive front-end interfaces for critical trading applications using React and Redux with real-time data streaming via Solace.
Streamlined CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub, reducing deployment times by 30% and minimizing production errors.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Developer
achievements: Developed and maintained full-stack features for a risk management software platform.
Worked with Angular, Node.js (Express), and PostgreSQL.
Contributed to API design and implementation (REST, gRPC).

experience.title: Software Developer
achievements: Provided JavaScript consultation and development services to various clients.
Specialized in modern frontend frameworks like Angular and React.
Contributed to building responsive and performant web applications.

experience.title: Software Developer
achievements: Developed features for a customer experience management platform.
Worked with J2EE technologies and SQL Server.
Contributed to backend systems and database interactions.

experience.title: Software Developer
achievements: Developed and maintained property tax management software.
Worked with Java backend systems and MySQL databases.
Focused on database schema design and backend logic.

experience.title: Java Developer
achievements: Contributed to the development of Java-based enterprise applications.
Focused on backend development and system integration.

projects.title: ATLAS AI System (Playdly)
projects.description: An advanced AI system that enhances Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) through dynamic embedding model selection and intelligent orchestration for project management and automation.
highlights: Implemented a novel architecture for dynamic LLM and embedding model selection.
Created an adaptive orchestration layer for context-aware retrieval strategies.
Built a performance analytics dashboard to optimize token usage and relevance.
Designed for scalability and efficiency in AI-driven workflows.

projects.title: TurboTax Document Processing System (Intuit)
projects.description: A system for automated document verification and data extraction that significantly reduced processing time for tax documents, enabling real-time feedback.
highlights: Reduced onboarding time for new document types from one month to three days.
Implemented real-time validation feedback for customer document uploads.
Created a flexible template system for easy addition of new document types.
Ensured high availability and scalability for critical tax season periods.

projects.title: RBC Cross-Asset Trading Platform Modernization (RBC)
projects.description: Modernized a single-dealer platform for financial trading across multiple asset classes with real-time data streaming, improving performance and code quality.
highlights: Implemented responsive design for mobile and tablet access.
Developed critical trading application UIs with real-time data.

education.degree: Engineering Technologist Diploma in Systems Analysis and Design (Honours)
education.institution: UNEFA (Universidad Nacional Experimental Polit√©cnica de la Fuerza Armada Nacional Bolivariana)
highlights: Assessed by ICAS (International Credential Assessment Service of Canada) as equivalent to a Canadian Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.

certifications.name: Fundamentals of AI Agents Using RAG and LangChain
certifications.details: Understanding RAG concepts with Hugging Face, PyTorch, and LangChain. Skills in encoders, FAISS library, in-context learning, prompt engineering, and building applications with LangChain chains and agents.

certifications.name: IBM Generative AI Engineering
certifications.details: Specialization in generative AI engineering, covering training, developing, fine-tuning, and deploying large language models and AI agents for NLP applications.

certifications.name: IBM Generative AI Engineering Professional Certificate
certifications.details: Professional certification demonstrating job-ready gen AI engineering skills including building and deploying AI applications, agents and chatbots using Python, Flask, PyTorch, and frameworks like RAG and LangChain.

certifications.name: Generative AI Advance Fine-Tuning for LLMs
certifications.details: Advanced techniques for fine-tuning large language models including parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT), LoRA, QLoRA, and optimization methods for model training.

certifications.name: Generative AI Engineering and Fine-Tuning Transformers
certifications.details: Skills in transformer architectures, Hugging Face, PyTorch, parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT), LoRA, QLoRA, and advanced prompting techniques for optimizing LLMs.

certifications.name: Generative AI Language Modeling with Transformers
certifications.details: Expertise in transformer-based language modeling, working with generative AI models, and implementing natural language processing solutions using modern transformer architectures.

certifications.name: Gen AI Foundational Models for NLP & Language Understanding
certifications.details: Foundational knowledge of generative AI models for natural language processing, including language understanding techniques and applications of foundation models.

certifications.name: Building Generative AI-Powered Applications with Python
certifications.details: Hands-on experience building real-world generative AI applications including chatbots, voice assistants, meeting summarizers, and language translators using Python, Flask, Gradio, LangChain, GPT-3, Llama 2, and RAG technology.

certifications.name: Data Analysis with Python
certifications.details: Professional badge demonstrating proficiency in data analysis using Python, including data manipulation, statistical analysis, and visualization techniques.

certifications.name: Machine Learning with Python
certifications.details: Comprehensive skills in machine learning using Python, including supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, model evaluation, and implementation of ML solutions.

certifications.name: Developing AI Applications with Python and Flask
certifications.details: Skills in developing AI-enabled web applications using Python and Flask framework, including Watson AI libraries integration, unit testing, and application deployment.

certifications.name: Generative AI for Software Developers
certifications.details: Specialization focused on applying generative AI technologies in software development, including prompt engineering, code generation, and integration of AI tools in development workflows.

certifications.name: Generative AI and LLMs: Architecture and Data Preparation
certifications.details: Understanding of generative AI architectures including RNNs, transformers, GANs, VAEs, and diffusion models. Skills in tokenization with NLTK, spaCy, Hugging Face, and building data pipelines with PyTorch.

certifications.name: Generative AI: Introduction and Applications
certifications.details: Foundational understanding of generative AI capabilities across text, image, audio, video, and code generation. Familiarity with tools like GPT, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and hands-on experience with ChatGPT.

certifications.name: Generative AI: Prompt Engineering Basics
certifications.details: Essential skills in prompt engineering techniques for optimizing generative AI model responses, including prompt design, refinement strategies, and best practices for AI interaction.

certifications.name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI)
certifications.details: Comprehensive introduction to AI concepts, machine learning fundamentals, neural networks, and practical applications of artificial intelligence across various industries.

certifications.name: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
certifications.details: Foundational Python programming skills for data science and AI development, including data structures, libraries, and practical application development using Python.
